changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Ajout d'un bouton pour activer le touchl: Added a button to activate the hue bridge touchlink
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis sur la decouverte: Fixed a problem with the discovery of scenes on the 2nd Hue bridge
changelog.md.Ajout du Hue White Bulb A67 E27 1600lm: Addition of the Hue White Bulb A67 E27 1600lm
changelog.md.Ajout du smart plug (on\/off seulement p: Addition of the smart plug (on / off only no status feedback for the moment
changelog.md.Correction d'un défaut de surcharge CPU: Correction of a CPU overload fault when deactivating a sensor (the daemon must be restarted following the update to apply the correction
changelog.md.Prise en charge de plusieurs ponts (2 po: Support for multiple bridges (2 at the moment
changelog.md.Ajout d'une commande pour savoir si l'am: Addition of an order to know if the bulb is reachable or not
changelog.md.Correction de la remise à 0 de l'état de: Correction of resetting the lamp state to 0 when it is turned back on
changelog.md.Ajout d'un bouton pour supprimer une com: Add a button to delete an order
changelog.md.Correction des configurations pour les a: Correction of the configurations for the Ikea bulbs (be careful, they must be removed from jeedom and redo a synchronization
changelog.md.Prise en charge du retour d'état des pri: Support for status feedback from OSRAM SMART sockets (attention requires a new inclusion
changelog.md.Ajout d'un bouton de synchronisation sur: Add a synchronization button on the equipment management page
changelog.md.Ajout de configuration de lumières génér: Added configuration of generic color and non-color lights
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'état des bouto: Correction of a bug on the state of the buttons when restarting the bridge
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'inversion de p: Correction of a bug on the presence inversion for the motion sensor (for those already created, it will be necessary to check the inversion box on the line of the Presence command
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le statut des pi: Fixed a bug on the status of parts (on / off) if there is no colored lamp in it
changelog.md.Correction de l'heure des valeurs des ca: Correction of the time of the sensor values
changelog.md.Passage sur le nouveau système de docume: Switch to the new documentation system
changelog.md.Ajout du modèle TRADFRI bulb GU10 W 400l: Addition of the TRADFRI bulb GU10 W 400lm model
changelog.md.Ajout d'animations lever et coucher de s: Addition of sunrise and sunset animations (be careful all

index.md.Ce plugin va vous permettre d'intégrer v: This plugin will allow you to integrate your Philips Hue ecosystem into Jeedom
index.md.La plugin offre la possibilité de pilote: The plugin offers the possibility to drive up to 2 Philips Hue bridges simultaneously
index.md.Comme tout plugin Jeedom, le plugin: Like any Jeedom plugin, the plugin
index.md.Une fois le plugin activé, il faudra ren: Once the plugin is activated, you will need to enter the IP address at which your Philips Hue bridge can be reached
index.md.Normalement le plugin devrait vous deman: Normally the plugin should ask you to press the bridge button during the first synchronization
index.md.Vous pouvez renseigner jusqu'à 2 ponts P: You can enter up to 2 Philips Hue bridges that will be able to communicate with Jeedom simultaneously
index.md.utilise son propre démon afin de rester: uses its own daemon in order to stay in constant contact with the Philips Hue bridge (s)
index.md.Vous pouvez en contrôler le statut sur l: You can check the status on the plugin configuration page
index.md.Il n'est normalement pas nécessaire de d: It is normally not necessary to start the daemon manually, it is automatically managed by the plugin
index.md.la liste des modules compatible avec le: the list of modules compatible with the plugin
index.md.permet d'ajouter un nouvel équipement Ph: allows you to add new Philips Hue equipment
index.md.En cliquant sur un équipement déjà créé: By clicking on an item of equipment already created in the list, you are directed to its configuration page
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.les catégories de l'équipement (il peut: equipment categories (it can belong to several categories
index.md.permet de rendre l'équipement actif: allows to make the equipment active
index.md.rend l'équipement visible sur le dashboa: makes the equipment visible on the dashboard
index.md.renseignez le modèle de votre équipement: enter the model of your Philips Hue equipment
index.md.indique le pont sur lequel l'équipement: indicates the bridge on which the equipment is connected
index.md.indique à Jeedom de ne jamais marquer la: tells Jeedom to never mark the lamp as unreachable
index.md.Il y aura toujours un équipement nommé \: There will always be a device named "All lamps" which corresponds to group 0 which exists in all cases
index.md.En cliquant sur le second onglet, nous r: By clicking on the second tab, we find the list of orders
index.md.le nom affiché sur le dashboard: the name displayed on the dashboard
index.md.permet d'affecter une icône à la command: allows you to assign an icon to the command
index.md.permet d'afficher ou de masquer certaine: allows you to display or hide certain commands and / or to log their values
index.md.permet de définir des paramètres optionn: allows to define optional parameters on the info / numeric commands
index.md.permet d'afficher la fenêtre de configur: displays the command's advanced configuration window
index.md.permet de supprimer la commande: allows you to delete the command
index.md.Le groupe 0 ne peut pas être supprimé ni: Group 0 cannot be deleted or modified
index.md.Il pilote forcément toutes les lampes et: He necessarily controls all the lights and it is also he who carries the scenes
index.md.simplement en sauvegardant la configurat: simply by saving the plugin configuration
index.md.En effet vous pouvez faire des \"scènes\: Indeed you can make "scenes" with the Philips Hue
index.md.Celles-ci doivent absolument être faites: These must absolutely be done from the mobile application (impossible to do from Jeedom
index.md.Suite à l'ajout d'une scène vous devez a: After adding a scene you must absolutely synchronize Jeedom with the bridge
index.md.Commande un peu particulière qui est con: A little peculiar command that is designed to be used in a scenario
index.md.Elle permet de définir la durée en secon: It allows to define the duration in seconds of the transition between the current state and the next command
index.md.Par exemple le matin vous pouvez vouloir: For example in the morning you may want to simulate the sunrise in 3 minutes
index.md.Dans votre scénario vous avez donc juste: In your scenario you just have to call the transition command with
index.md.en paramètre puis appeler la commande co: in parameter then call the color command to the desired color
index.md.Les animations sont des enchainements de: The animations are transition sequences, currently there are
index.md.permet de simuler un lever de soleil: allows you to simulate a sunrise
index.md.Il peut prendre en paramètre: It can take as a parameter
index.md.Pour 5 minutes il faudra indiquer: For 5 minutes it will be necessary to indicate
index.md.permet de synchroniser la température de: allows you to synchronize the color temperature and brightness with the sun (they also change during the day
index.md.Attention à bien renseigner dans jeedom: Be careful to enter your latitude / longitude in jeedom
index.md.Voici la liste des codes pour les bouton: Here is the list of codes for the buttons
index.md.La même chose avec XXX0 pour la touche a: The same with XXX0 for the key pressed, XXX1 for the key held and XXX2 for the key released
index.md.Voici les séquences pour le bouton On pa: Here are the sequences for the On button for example
index.md.Lors de l'appui on passe sur 1000 et qua: When pressed we go to 1000 and when we release we go to 1002
index.md.Lors de l'appui on passe sur 1000, duran: During the press we pass on 1000, during the press we pass on 1001, when we release we pass on 1002
index.md.J'ai l'impression qu'il y a un décalage: I have the impression that there is a difference on certain colors between what I ask for and the color of the bulb
index.md.Il semble que la grille de couleur des a: It looks like the color grid of the bulbs has an offset, we are looking for how to correct
index.md.Mon équipement (lampe, interrupteur, etc: My equipment (lamp, switch, etc ...) is not recognized by the plugin, how to do
index.md.nous décrire l'équipement que vous voule: describe the equipment you want us to add with photos and its possibilities and send us the debug log of the synchronization with the bridge, all by contacting us with a support request
index.md.J'ai ajouté l'historisation d'une comman: I added the historization of an order but it does not work
index.md.Pour des questions de performance, il fa: For performance issues, you must restart the Philips Hue daemon for it to take this change into account
